倍.definition: (two, three etc) -fold; times (multiplier); double; to increase or multiply

倍增.definition: to double; to redouble; to increase many times over; to multiply by a factor; multiplication

倍感.definition: to feel even more (lonely etc); to be extremely (sad, delighted etc)

倍足類.definition: Diplopoda (arthropod class with a pair of legs on each segment, including centipedes and millipedes)
